page.title: 17Playground Games
page.content: At Linslade Middle School we play lots of different playground games. One of these is "Witches in the Gluepot".One person is the witch and they have to catch someone and put them in the gluepot. Once you are in the gluepot you must wait until the others, who are not the witch, tig (touch) you, then you can get out of the gluepot. Once you have been caught three times you are the witch. Another of the games is "Pom In". In this game you must get to the post before the person who is "It" tigs you. This is a rhyme you say to see who is "It":"Ibble Obble, Black Bobble, Ibble Obble, OUT!" To do this rhyme, you stand in a circle and go around the players in turn. Whoever lands on "OUT" is not "It". You keep going until you are left with one person who is "It".
